title: Nagarjuna son Akhil Shriya wedding cancelled by the pair - Tamil Movie News
text: Nagarjuna to start film institute Kollywood superstar Nagarjunaâ€™s elder son Naga Chaitanya is engaged to Samantha Ruth Prabhu while his younger son Akhil was engaged to Shriya the granddaughter of business tycoon GVK Reddy. The marriage was fixed in May to be held in Rome, Italy and invitations were given to Telugu and Tamil celebrities. The marriage between Akhil and Shriya has been reportedly called off by the pair and information has been sent to all invitees to cancel their tickets and both the families have also cancelled theirs. Official word from the family is expected soon to clear the air as to what transpired.
